messages.content: The NHS has been my life. I started work as a doctor in 1982... Our beloved NHS is at breaking point... We cannot let this vandalism go on any longer. That's why I am campaigning for the Liberal Democrats in this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party to set out a clear plan to fund the NHS. A penny on income tax for the NHS will ease the pressure on NHS staff and patients until long-term solutions can be found.

issues.health: Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. This winter saw the worst ever crisis for A&E departments. 1.2 million of our elderly people are not getting the care they need. 15% of operations are cancelled.

leaflet.personalStatement: The NHS has been my life. I started work as a doctor in 1982. For nearly 35 years, I've proudly served our NHS.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Royal College of General Practitioners

images.caption: Campaign leaflet featuring Dr Clare Gerada discussing the NHS and her role with the Liberal Democrats.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - As an NHS doctor, I am fearful of the damage that would be done to the NHS by an all-powerful Conservative government. At this election, the future of our NHS is in your hands.
